attributes.action: Start introducing housing to soldiers/army personel as soon as they leave army
attributes.additional_details: Military need more help when leaving army.  Some friends of mine leave army and havent got anything to fall into regarding jobs and housing.  They should be high priority in my opinion
attributes.background: Start introducing housing for military personel as mostly all army leave there posts and are deemed homeless if no house to go back to

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585941
